abstract: Some of Berkshire Hathaway’s $43 billion cash hoard, usually intended for acquisitions, will be used to bolster the flagging shares of Warren E. Buffett’s company.
snippet: Some of Berkshire Hathaway’s $43 billion cash hoard, usually intended for acquisitions, will be used to bolster the flagging shares of Warren E. Buffett’s company.
lead_paragraph: It looks as if Berkshire Hathaway‘s “elephant gun” of $43 billion in cash will also be pointed at itself.

headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway to Buy Back Shares
